content:
During the last WGM in Atlanta many of you came to say bye bye before I leave for my four month sabbatical. I also promised you a way to keep track of where I am, and here it is: https://www.polarsteps.com/EwoutKramer/2525456-from-kunming-to-saigon

This is a kind of light-weight GPS tracker that will show my whereabouts, and allow me to post a photo or two now and then, and maybe a small travel story.

See you all in 2020 at the San Antonio WGM!
@Ewout Kramer that was a fun trip! Thanks for sharing the tracking website. You had quite the adventure and shared some amazing photos!
Thanks Ron! Yes, it was a great adventure, still getting used to be back to regular life. I started my laptop for the first time in 4 month this morning. Lot of catching up to do ;-)

Ewout Kramer said:

I started my laptop for the first time in 4 month this morning.

That is TRULY hard for me to imagine!
So good to see you back on deck, will hear from you in a month when you've completed the backlog of emails!
"I'm not at my desk right now. Your e-mail will not be read." - there'll be no backlog whatsoever ;-)

Ewout Kramer said:

Thanks Ron! Yes, it was a great adventure, still getting used to be back to regular life. I started my laptop for the first time in 4 month this morning. Lot of catching up to do ;-)

Just delete everything - if it's important they'll resend :wink:

Glad you got to have that experience, and glad to have you back. The pictures were amazing, though I don't know if the web translator did all of your posts justice :-)
